projects.title: Carbon Water Filter | Aquahacking Challenge
projects.bodyText:
- Conceptualized and engineered a high-efficiency water filtration system tailored for Indigenous communities in BC 

 -  Spearheaded the development of a prototype for the filtration subsystem and presented the final product to a panel of Aquahacking judges, achieving a top 5 finish.

projects.title: Distal Femur Plate
projects.bodyText:
Distal Femur Fracture Plate designed for elderly women. 
 -  Titanium alloy frame with internal fixation to prevent plate bending. 
 Adaptable screw placement with bicortical threaded screws.

projects.title: Keyboard PCB Design
projects.bodyText:
A simple keyboard PCB made using KiCAD to learn the software and eventually help in creating my own custom keyboard. 
 Diode-isolated key matrix to prevent ghosting; designed for ATmega32U4.

projects.title: UBC SailBot Design Team
projects.bodyText: Designed, specified, tested, and assembled components for the rudder system, including a carbon fiber composite rudder fin, twill-weave carbon fiber shaft, stuffing box design, and motor brackets.

projects.title: Sinus Rinse Sensor Application
projects.bodyText:
An app that allows surgeons and clinicians to track NeilMed Sinus Rinse usage. 
 - Waterproof sensor housing 
 - Simple and efficient data logging 
 - Durable silicon strap for convenience

projects.title: Bike Anti-Theft Locking System
projects.bodyText:
Bike theft is extremely common in universities. As part of a designathon, our team worked to create a robust anti-theft mechanism to reduce bike thefts on campus. 
 
 - I created the base for the stand in Solidworks, and performed rigorous static calculations to justify our design, alongside FEA simulations for bending and compression. 
 
 - Achieved a second-place finish.

projects.title: PPG Signal Acqusition and Filtering
projects.bodyText:
A simple DIY PPG sensor to detect heart rate. 
 - Used a Chebyshev filter in MATLAB to improve signal quality.

projects.title: Mechanical Phone Holder
projects.bodyText:
Designed and machined multiple components of an adjustable mechanical phone holder made of aluminum and brass. 
 - Tool bit grinding and lathing operations. 
 - Familiarity with facing, turning, drilling, tapping, and face milling operations.

projects.title: Bioreactor CFD Simulation
projects.bodyText:
An ongoing project to learn more about CFD using ANSYS, to simulate mixing efficiency and analyze flow behaviour in a bench-scale bioreactor. 
 - Simulating velocity fields, shear stress distribution relevant to 3D cell cultures. 
 - Experimenting with reactor geometry, impeller configuration and boundary conditions.
